item.title: What Is XLNet and Why It Outperforms BERT
item.description: What Is XLNet and Why It Outperforms BERT [ read more ] Basic knowledge of XLNet to understand the difference between XLNet and BERT intuitively 4 min read Building a Simple Chatbot from Scratch in Python (using NLTK) [ read more ] Gartner estimates that by 2020, chatbots will be handling 85 percent of customer-service interactions; theyâ€¦ 11 min read Adapters: A Compact and Extensible Transfer Learning Method for NLP [ read more ] Adapters obtain comparable results to BERT on several NLP tasks while achieving parameter efficiency.
